head: Open Financial Technologies
content: In my role at Open Financial Technologies, I was deep into data analysis. We streamlined processes using Metabase, Looker, BigQuery, and even some Python scripting. It made collaboration across teams much smoother.

head: Mojocare
content: At Mojocare, it was all about efficiency. Task automation saved us valuable time, and with optimization and advanced modeling, we not only improved decision-making by 20% but also boosted data accuracy by a whopping 90%. It was a game-changer.

head: Eloelo
content: Eloelo was exciting. I built and reported KPIs for a massive 500K-user mobile app. Setting up the data infrastructure with SQL was key, and I collaborated on elevating database standards to enhance our analytics game.

head: Bosch
content: Over at Bosch, I had my hands full developing and maintaining data-driven systems. This included crafting a robust reporting system for production faults and log settings analysis.
